categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Oll Maccabe was a male Twi'lek who had been a professor of anthropology at the Alderaan University before the destruction of Alderaan by the first Death Star in 0 BBY. Having been offworld at the time, Maccabe became a supporter of the Rebel Alliance. Later on, he enlisted the help of one of his students, Padija Anjeri, in recovering stolen Twi'leki artifacts.
